TopicTitle: Possible to clamp on anything to the Claw?

Articles.Content: I've been trying to dock two ships with each other using a Claw. Is it possible to clamp onto any object, like rocket engines and scanners for instance? I've been testing this and I'm only able to connect to something like fuel tanks. I'm hoping I'm doing something wrong haha.
Hello @xendelaar, your question has been moved to gameplay questions.

31 minutes ago, xendelaar said:

I've been trying to dock two ships with each other using a Claw. Is it possible to clamp onto any object, like rocket engines and scanners for instance? I've been testing this and I'm only able to connect to something like fuel tanks. I'm hoping I'm doing something wrong haha. 

The Claw can grapple any part, but it can be bit finicky to get it to trigger.

Yes, a klaw can grab almost anything. However, you have to understand the one important rule about klaws: the klaw will only function if it is almost perpendicular to the surface that it is grabbing. So you need to understand the shape of the target object, or you have to try fifty times and get lucky.

There are some exceptions. A klaw cannot grab any kind of wheel, for example.
